Serving

  • Prep: 15 mins
  • Cook: 10 mins
  • Total: 25 mins
  • Servings: 2 servings
  • Yield: 1 pizza

Ingredients

  • 1 tablespoon tomato paste
  • 1 tablespoon water
  • Salt, to taste
  • 1 (175 grams) ball store-bought or homemade pizza dough
  • 3 ounces barrat cheese, cut into 1-inch pieces
  • 4 thin slices prociutto, torn in half lengthwise
  • 1/2 cup lightly packed arugula leaves
  • Extra-virgin olive oil, for drizzling
  • 1/4 cup shaved Parmesan cheese
